statements: SELECT ad_name, click_through_rate FROM ad_performance_metrics WHERE ad_id = 1;
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, click_through_rate, conversions FROM ad_performance_metrics WHERE click_through_rate > 2.5;
SELECT * FROM ad_performance_metrics WHERE conversions = 0;
SELECT ad_name FROM ad_performance_metrics WHERE conversions > 100 ORDER BY click_through_rate DESC;
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, click_through_rate FROM ad_performance_metrics ORDER BY ad_id DESC;
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, click_through_rate, conversions FROM ad_performance_metrics WHERE conversions > 10 ORDER BY click_through_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM ad_performance_metrics WHERE ad_name LIKE '%promo%' AND click_through_rate >= 2.5;
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, click_through_rate, conversions FROM ad_performance_metrics WHERE click_through_rate > 3 AND conversions < 5 ORDER BY conversions ASC;
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, click_through_rate, conversions FROM ad_performance_metrics WHERE click_through_rate BETWEEN 1.5 AND 4.0 ORDER BY ad_id;
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, click_through_rate, conversions FROM ad_performance_metrics WHERE click_through_rate < 2 OR conversions > 10 ORDER BY ad_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM ad_performance_metrics WHERE ad_id = 1;
SELECT ad_id, click_through_rate, conversions FROM ad_performance_metrics;
SELECT * FROM ad_campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 10;
SELECT campaign_id, total_budget FROM ad_campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ad_performance_metrics JOIN ad_campaigns ON ad_performance_metrics.ad_id = ad_campaigns.campaign_id;
SELECT ad_id, click_through_rate FROM ad_performance_metrics;
SELECT * FROM ad_performance_metrics WHERE conversions > 100 ORDER BY ad_id DESC;
SELECT ad_id, conversions, click_through_rate FROM ad_performance_metrics WHERE click_through_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY conversions DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, total_budget, start_date, end_date FROM ad_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM ad_performance_metrics JOIN ad_campaigns ON ad_performance_metrics.ad_id = ad_campaigns.campaign_id;
SELECT * FROM ads;
SELECT ad_id, ad_name FROM ads WHERE click_through_rate > 0.5;
SELECT ad_name, click_through_rate FROM ads WHERE conversions >= 10 ORDER BY click_through_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM ad_clicks WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT ad_id, count(*) AS total_clicks FROM ad_clicks GROUP BY ad_id ORDER BY total_clicks DESC;
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, click_through_rate, conversions FROM ads WHERE conversions > 10 ORDER BY ad_id DESC;
SELECT ad_name, click_time, user_id FROM ad_clicks WHERE click_time < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY click_time ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT ad_id, conversion_time, user_id FROM ad_conversions WHERE user_id = 12345 ORDER BY conversion_time DESC;
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, conversions FROM ads WHERE click_through_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY conversions DESC, ad_id ASC;
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, click_time, user_id FROM ads JOIN ad_clicks ON ads.ad_id = ad_clicks.ad_id WHERE ad_name LIKE '%Special%' ORDER BY click_time DESC, ad_id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM ad_performance_metrics ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT ad_id, click_through_rate, conversions FROM ad_performance_metrics WHERE conversions > 50;
SELECT ad_id, date FROM ad_performance_metrics WHERE click_through_rate > 0.1 ORDER BY date ASC;

SELECT ad_campaigns.campaign_name, ad_groups.group_name, ad_performance_metrics.click_through_rate FROM ad_campaigns JOIN ad_groups ON ad_campaigns.campaign_id = ad_groups.campaign_id JOIN ad_performance_metrics ON ad_groups.group_id = ad_performance_metrics.ad_id;
SELECT client_name, contact_email, phone_number FROM ad_clients WHERE client_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM ad_performance_metrics WHERE id = 1;
SELECT ad_id, date, click_through_rate FROM ad_performance_metrics WHERE conversions > 5;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM ad_campaigns WHERE budget >= 500.00 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT group_name, target_audience, bid_amount FROM ad_groups WHERE bid_amount < 100.00 AND campaign_id = 3 ORDER BY group_name ASC;
SELECT client_name, contact_email FROM ad_clients WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL AND client_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM ad_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM ad_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT group_name, campaign_name FROM ad_groups JOIN ad_campaigns ON ad_groups.campaign_id = ad_campaigns.id;
SELECT ad_name, click_through_rate FROM ads WHERE conversions > 100 ORDER BY click_through_rate DESC;
SELECT ad_id, impression_count FROM ad_impressions WHERE impression_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM ad_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT ad_name, click_through_rate FROM ads ORDER BY click_through_rate DESC
SELECT ad_name, conversion_rate FROM ads ORDER BY conversion_rate ASC
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM ad_campaigns JOIN ad_groups ON ad_campaigns.id = ad_groups.campaign_id
SELECT ad_name, impression_count FROM ads JOIN ad_impressions ON ads.id = ad_impressions.ad_id WHERE impression_date = '2021-10-15' LIMIT 10
